item.description:
We are a group of over 40 singles that want to recapture the great old days of dancing and romance while creating exciting new days, meeting new friends and maybe one soulmate, on or off the dance floor. Whether you are a Meetup member or not, if you're over 40 and single (single couples also) you are invited to the party.
I would like to know which area you'd like to see a North of 40 dance held. Marblehead is hard for many people to get to and not close to a major highway. Many of our members haven't attended a dance yet and I'd like to know where and what would get you to attend our dances. If you have attended a dance please let me know what you liked and didn't like.
If you have any questions, please email me.
Sincerely, Rick
Check out North of 40's Meetup affiliates: SINGLES DANCE DINNER PARTY- AGE 30-65 Hosted by Richard Tosti/Burlington - http://www.dance.meetup.com/393
BOSTON-35-WINE-DINE-DANCE-AND-BE-MERRY Hosted by Ms. Marianne/Boston - http://www.meetup.com/BOSTON-35-WINE-DINE-DANCE-AND-BE-MERRY-MEET-UP
Joshua 's Meet up Group - Pool, bowling, movies, travel and BEER! http://www.meetup.com/Pool-bowling-movies-travel-and-BEER
item.name: North of 40 Singles
